segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she doesn’t even care about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just happy to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still completely focused on her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t turn around and catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like they’re going to get in trouble if she sees them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable—I don’t know how it hasn’t tipped yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it this time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they share the cookies with me later.
segments.speaker: PAR
